flawed_nl_solution:
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3190>>3190 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3190-1200=<<3190-1200=1990>>1990 dollars.
#### 1990

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 3200, not 3190. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
